message: Let's split it evenly, Bob. Fair is fair, right?
I think I deserve a bit more, don't you?
Okay, I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not going to give up all the gains. Let's get this done.
You're getting closer, but I think I can do better.
Alright, Bob, let's call it a day. I'm not going to give you any more than this. Take it or leave it.
